Package com.ibm.rest

Class ScreenController

java.lang.Object
com.ibm.rest.ScreenController
@RestController @CrossOrigin public class ScreenController extends Object
REST controller for handling Screen-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • addScreen

      @PostMapping(path="/admin/screen/add", consumes="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> addScreen(@RequestBody Screen s) throws ScreenAlreadyExistException
      End point for adding a new screen. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/admin/screen/add
      Parameters:
      s - the Screen object to add
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the status and response message
      Throws:
      ScreenAlreadyExistException - if the screen already exists

    • updateScreen

      @PutMapping(path="/admin/screen/update", consumes="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> updateScreen(@RequestBody Screen s) throws ScreenNotFoundException, ScreenAlreadyExistException
      End point for updating an existing screen. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/admin/screen/update
      Parameters:
      s - the updated Screen object
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the status and response message
      Throws:
      ScreenNotFoundException - if the screen is not found
      ScreenAlreadyExistException - if the updated screen already exists

    • getAllScreens

      @GetMapping(path="/admin/screen/all", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Screen>> getAllScreens()
      End point for retrieving all screens. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/admin/screen/all
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the list of screens

    • getScreenById

      @GetMapping(path="/admin/screen/search/id/{id}", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Screen> getScreenById(@PathVariable int id) throws ScreenNotFoundException
      End point for retrieving a screen by its ID. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/admin/screen/search/id/{id}
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the screen to retrieve
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the retrieved screen
      Throws:
      ScreenNotFoundException - if the screen is not found

    • getScreenByName

      @GetMapping(path="/admin/screen/search/name/{name}", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Screen> getScreenByName(@PathVariable String name) throws ScreenNotFoundException
      End point for retrieving a screen by its name. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/admin/screen/search/name/{name}
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the screen to retrieve
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the retrieved screen
      Throws:
      ScreenNotFoundException - if the screen is not found

    • removeScreenById

      @DeleteMapping(path="/admin/screen/remove/id/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> removeScreenById(@PathVariable int id) throws ScreenNotFoundException
      End point for removing a screen by its ID. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/admin/screen/remove/id/{id}
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the screen to remove
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the status and response message
      Throws:
      ScreenNotFoundException - if the screen is not found

    • removeScreenByName

      @DeleteMapping(path="/admin/screen/remove/name/{name}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> removeScreenByName(@PathVariable String name) throws ScreenNotFoundException
      End point for removing a screen by its name. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/admin/screen/remove/name/{name}
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the screen to remove
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the status and response message
      Throws:
      ScreenNotFoundException - if the screen is not found
